sarcasm_detection.text: Wow, what a 'masterpiece' this turned out to be
Sure, because the world needed another sequel
Yeah, two hours of my life I'll never get back
Brilliant. Just brilliant. If you like wasting time.
The acting was so 'natural' I couldn't stop laughing
A stunning achievement in putting audiences to sleep

Couldn't put this book down, truly captivating

The film is directed by Christopher Nolan

mixed_sentiment.text: Beautiful cinematography can't save the boring story
I loved the visuals but hated the ending
Amazing special effects, disappointing character development
The first half was brilliant, second half fell apart

subtle_sentiment.text: It's fine for what it is
